chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
M: Model

Goal:
forall (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (ts : Terms L n) (v : nat) (s : Term L) (r : naryRel (U M) n), interpRels n r (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) ts <-> interpRels n r value (substituteTerms L n ts v s)

Premises:
naryRel = fix naryRel (A : Set) (n : nat) {struct n} : Type := match n with | 0 => Prop | S m => A -> naryRel A m end : Set -> nat -> Type Arguments naryRel _%type_scope _%nat_scope
updateValue = fun (value : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (v : U M) (x : nat) => if Nat.eq_dec n x then v else value x : (nat -> U M) -> nat -> U M -> nat -> U M Arguments updateValue _%function_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope
interpRels : forall m : nat, naryRel (U M) m -> (nat -> U M) -> Terms L m -> Prop
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
substituteTerms : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), Terms L n -> nat -> Term L -> Terms L n
value : forall A : Type, A -> option A
Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Arguments var _ _%nat_scope Arguments Terms _ _%nat_scope Arguments Tcons _ _%nat_scope
U = fun m : Model => let (U, _, _) := m in U : Model -> Set
interpTerm = fix interpTerm (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) {struct t} : U M := match t with | @var _ v => value v | @apply _ f ts => interpTerms (arity L (inr f)) (func M f) value ts end with interpTerms (m : nat) (f : naryFunc (U M) m) (value : nat -> U M) (ts : Terms L m) {struct ts} : U M := match ts in (Terms _ n) return (naryFunc (U M) n -> U M) with | @Tnil _ => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) 0 => f0 | @Tcons _ m0 t ts0 => fun f0 : naryFunc (U M) (S m0) => interpTerms m0 (f0 (interpTerm value t)) value ts0 end f for interpTerm
freeVarInterpRel : forall (v1 v2 : nat -> U M) (n : nat) (ts : Terms L n) (r : naryRel (U M) n), (forall x : nat, In x (freeVarTerms L n ts) -> v1 x = v2 x) -> interpRels n r v1 ts -> interpRels n r v2 ts
subInterpTerm : forall (value : nat -> U M) (t : Term L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpTerm (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) t = interpTerm value (substituteTerm L t v s)
interpFormula = fix interpFormula (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) {struct f} : Prop := match f with | @equal _ t s => interpTerm value t = interpTerm value s | @atomic _ r ts => interpRels (arity L (inl r)) (rel M r) value ts | @impH _ A B => interpFormula value A -> interpFormula value B | @notH _ A => interpFormula value A -> False | @forallH _ v A => forall x : U M, interpFormula (updateValue value v x) A end : (nat -> U M) -> Formula L -> Prop Arguments interpFormula _%function_scope
subFormulaRelation : forall (L : Language) (r : Relations L) (ts : Terms L (arity L (inl r))) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (atomic L r ts) v s = atomic L r (substituteTerms L (arity L (inl r)) ts v s)
subTermsId : forall (L : Language) (n : nat) (ts : Terms L n) (v : nat), substituteTerms L n ts v (var L v) = ts
subTermFunction : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : Terms L (arity L (inr f))) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteTerm L (apply L f ts) v s = apply L f (substituteTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts v s)
interpTerms : forall m : nat, naryFunc (U M) m -> (nat -> U M) -> Terms L m -> U M
Terms_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Set), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Terms_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> SProp), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Terms_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Type), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), P 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L) (t0 : Terms L n), P n t0 -> P (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P n t
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Terms L n), P0 n t
substituteFormulaForallNice : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (a : Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L b}), (forall (b : Formula L) (q : lt_depth L b (forallH L v a)) (r : nat * Term L), z1 b q r = z2 b q r) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaForall L v a z1 q = substituteFormulaForall L v a z2 q
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (VectorDef.cons ?A a 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A))) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a (S n) v)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n)), P n v where ?A : [L : Language M : Model |- Type]
model : forall U : Set, (forall f : Functions L, naryFunc U (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall r : Relations L, naryRel U (arity L (inl r))) -> Model
freeVarTermApply : forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L) (ts : Terms L (arity L (inr f))), freeVarTerm L (apply L f ts) = freeVarTerms L (arity L (inr f)) ts
subFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (notH L f) v s = notH L (substituteFormula L f v s)
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Term L), P t -> forall t0 : Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : Term L, P t
subFormulaEqual : forall (L : Language) (t1 t2 : Term L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (equal L t1 t2) v s = equal L (substituteTerm L t1 v s) (substituteTerm L t2 v s)
subTermVar2 : forall (L : Language) (v x : nat) (s : Term L), v <> x -> substituteTerm L (var L x) v s = var L x
Tcons : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n)
subFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (impH L f1 f2) v s = impH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
subFormulaAnd : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (andH L f1 f2) v s = andH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
subFormulaOr : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (orH L f1 f2) v s = orH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
subFormulaIff : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (iffH L f1 f2) v s = iffH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s)
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
subFormulaDepth : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), depth L (substituteFormula L f v s) = depth L f
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f z1 g z3 q =...
Record Model : Type := model { U : Set; func : forall f : Functions L, naryFunc U (arity L (inr f)); rel : forall r : Relations L, naryRel U (arity L (inl r)) } Arguments model _%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
subFormulaIfThenElse : forall (L : Language) (f1 f2 f3 : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (ifThenElseH L f1 f2 f3) v s = ifThenElseH L (substituteFormula L f1 v s) (substituteFormula L f2 v s) (substituteFormula L f3 v s)
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : Formula L, P f2 -> P (notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : Formula L), P f3 -> P (forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
subTermVar1 : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteTerm L (var L v) v s = s
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
subFormulaExist2 : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), exists nv : nat, ~ In nv (freeVarTerm L s) /\ nv <> v /\ ~ In nv (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarFormula L f)) /\ substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s))

```coq
intros value n ts v s r.
split.
- intros H. unfold interpRels in H. simpl in H. unfold updateValue. unfold interpTerm in H. unfold substituteTerms. unfold interpTerm. induction ts as [| n' t ts' IHts].
  + simpl. auto.
  + simpl in H. destruct r as [headArg tailArgs].
    simpl. simpl in IHts. specialize (IHts tailArgs). rewrite <- IHts. apply H.
- intros H. unfold interpRels. simpl. unfold updateValue. unfold interpTerm. unfold substituteTerms in H. unfold interpTerm in H. induction ts as [| n' t ts' IHts].
  + simpl in H. auto.
  + simpl. destruct r as [headArg tailArgs].
    simpl in H. simpl. apply IHts. apply H.
Qed.```
